Question.Subject: Which email provider comes with the best perks?
Question.Content: hotmail sure does have nice backgrounds, but i like the feel of yahoo... and aol is just so vibrant... like full of life, the others are dull and boring, but aol is so freaking messy and unorganized...
Question.ChosenAnswer: It would be impossible for an e-mail provider to suit everybody's taste 100%. Unless you are able to set up as a provider yourself, you have to be content with choosing the provider that most closely suits your requirement

Answer.Content: It would be impossible for an e-mail provider to suit everybody's taste 100%. Unless you are able to set up as a provider yourself, you have to be content with choosing the provider that most closely suits your requirement
